name: MediBridge
tagline: Web3-powered healthcare record interoperability with invisible UX.
description: MediBridge enables secure, consent-based sharing of patient medical records between hospitals using both traditional and Web3 flows. It features decentralized identity (DID), verifiable credentials, encrypted IPFS/Filecoin storage, and a user-friendly interface for both patients and hospital staff. Built with React, Node.js, Express, PostgreSQL, Ethers.js, and Drizzle ORM.
